TopicTitle: Crew Report, EVA and Sample should be able to transfer between capsule.

Articles.Content:
As I said in topic. I should be able to transfer data across capsules. but right now I can't.

How it will be trouble?

For example. I send a ship with lander to Duna, undock the lander, land the lander then grab a sample from it.

but when I'm back to rendezvous with the main ship. I want to leave the lander to save the delta-v of the main ship. but I can't do that because sample is in there.

If I can do that I could bring the main ship back and send a ship to get sample back to kerbin.

I hope this will be done. thank you squad.
Already? man I thought it's only me. my bad. topic closed.
I will close it and let you follow on that link DrHotdog posted
